definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
Legislative Yuan, the legislative branch of government under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan

sentences.english: In the first section are the improvement measures to the legislation of community-based correction.
sentences.chinese: 第一節，我國社區矯正類型的立法完善。

sentences.english: He had laid out his legislative agenda for an autumn special session.
sentences.chinese: 他還重排了秋季議會的立法議程。

sentences.english: PARLIAMENT】Parliament is the lawmaking group in Great Britain.
sentences.chinese: 國會在英國是立法團體。

sentences.english: The pro-slavery legislature passed a bill calling for such a convention.
sentences.chinese: 支持奴隸制的立法會通過了要求召開制憲會議的法案。

sentences.english: Occasionally, however, standards of poultry welfare must be safeguarded by legislation.
sentences.chinese: 然而有時候家禽福利標準必須由立法來保障。

sentences.english: Finally, the author made an explanation about the option of legislation system of easement.
sentences.chinese: 最後對地役權制度立法體系的選擇作了說明。

sentences.english: John is lobbying some members of the legislature.
sentences.chinese: 約翰在對一些立法委員們進行遊說。

sentences.english: The legislation of ZSP is full of innovative characters.
sentences.chinese: 中關村立法充溢着創新性品格。

sentences.english: Labour says…The process followed by National has been anti-democratic.
sentences.chinese: 工黨認爲，由國家黨主導的這個立法過程是反民主的。

sentences.english: Bayerische Landesbank is a corporation established under the German public law.
sentences.chinese: 德國巴伐利亞州銀行是一家依據德國立法組建的銀行。

sentences.english: The Regulation sets an excellent example for our futural non- contractual conflicts legislation.
sentences.chinese: 《條例》爲我國非合同之債法律選擇立法提供了借鑑。

sentences.english: The new legislation would have operated under a "three strikes" system.
sentences.chinese: 新的立法將在“事不過三”體系下運作。

sentences.english: The legislative intent of the Basic Law was clear and there was no need for an interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 基本法的立法原意明確，故無須釋法。

sentences.english: Needless to say, the British made no attempt to introduce anti-racist legislation.
sentences.chinese: 不用說，英國人是懶得在香港對反種族主義立法的。

sentences.english: “No dole, ” he instructed the legislative drafting team.
sentences.chinese: “沒有救濟金，”他這樣指示立法起草小組。

sentences.english: Some of the lawmakers questioned the need for more regulation of bottled water.
sentences.chinese: 一些立法者質疑瓶裝水需要更嚴格管理的看法。

definition: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress (abbr. of 全國人民代表大會常務委員會|全国人民代表大会常务委员会)
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 Chang2 Wei3 hui4
